mapper.sql: id, customer_id, service_type, service_name, address, estimated_price, order_time, is_done, is_accept, accept_time
mapper.insert:

customer_id,
service_type,
service_name,
address,
estimated_price,
order_time,

mapper.update:
update orders
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
service_type = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_name = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
estimated_price = #{estimatedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_done = #{isDone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_accept = #{isAccept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accept_time = #{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders set customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_type = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_name = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, estimated_price = #{estimatedPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_done = #{isDone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_accept = #{isAccept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_time = #{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
